Title: Strangers on a Train
Writer: John Wells (developer), Paul Abbott (creator), Etan Frankel
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Jeremy Allen White, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Against her better judgment, Fiona continues her secret affair with Robbie. And the situation nearly boils over, when Mike shows up at Robbie's apartment while Fiona's inside. Fiona is able...
